Utterance: Erica, tumi aaj kemon acho?
Bhalo. Dhonnobad.
Aapni bhalo korchhen?
Amar ekta part er moddhe jeta settle down hote chai, kintu tar pore amar ekta part jeta amar career ebong ami ja korchi ta onusorhon korte chai

Tai amader ekta onsho ache ja settle down hote chai, ekta onsho ja career er sathe cholte chai tai ei chair er jonno, ami ja korte pondo kori ta holo apni je chair e boshe achen, eti hobe abegpurno swyam, ei khetre, je poko career onusorhon korte chai. Hyan, er age nijeke mone hoy je amra aro beshi ja ami satyoi chai. Hyan, apni aro manoshikbhabey songkto. Tai etai apni chan. Eti seta ja ami chai. Sutrogh eti apnar pashe thakbe, jar chahida ebong chawar royeche ebong aro beg royeche. Thik ache, tai apni ei chair e thakben. Eta bodhgomjo.
Hyan.

Onyo chair e, ashun sei ongshorin shomolochoker bhitore je shomolochok ache. Jeeti bachcha hower jonno biye korar jonno basti sthaponer pokkhe okaloty korche. Ekti upaye eti ekti social chap er protinidhitto kore sei duiti pokkhe ki apnar kache alada bole mone hoyeche?
Hyan.
Apni mone koren je apni ekhane abeg poran shovonir akjon ongshorin shomolochok hote paren?
Ami tai mone kori. Thik ache.

Tai, ami mone kori apnar mone ache ei kajti sei kemon hobe, tini ei khetre ongshorin shomolochoker sathe kotha bolben, tai na? Tai ongshorin shomolochoker-a thitu hower pokkhe. Aar tarpor apni jokhon shomolochoker protikriya janate prousthuto hon, tokhon apni sei chair ti poriborton korben ebong chalit manoshik chahidagulir proti sara deben ebong kichu orthopurno korte chan. Thik ache. Tai jokhonoi apni prostut hon, age janun ebong sroshri ongshorin shomolochoker sathe kotha bolun.

Ami ja korchi ta ses korte chai, ebong ami ja shuru korechi ta ses korte chai. Ami amar careerer pothe onek kothor porishrom korechi, ebong ami ses korte khub kachakachi. Aar ami ami jonno ses korte chai jara ami nijer jonno seto korechi je laksho poron korte chai? Aar kichu ami somporko utsahi?
Tai apni apnar bivriti diyechen. Apni ki suich korte prousthut? Thik ache, bhalo suich. Tai ami ongshorin shomolochok boshonno.

Career gorar jonno sobshomoy somoy thakbe, kintu ei somoye amar theke ki asha kora jay setike amar focus kora dorkar, bachcha hower jonno sera boyose amar akjon premmoy premik ache je prothuto ebong biye korte ebong thitu hote chai. Aar apni je kono somoy nite paren emon ekta poth onusoron kore swarthoporno hochhen

Ekta ongshorin shomolochok shombidhanshil dikher ingito dey, ei khetre, kormojiboner dikti shob somoy somoy thakbe, kintu eti joto vongi khub roikhito ebong apni khada. Ami lokkho korechi je apni jokhon kotha bolchen tokhon apni apnar hati kichuta niche rakhen. Ongshorin shomolochok, sharirer narachara mone koraar chesta koren. Eta ekta kaj koraar chesta koren. Thik ache.

Mone koren eta obhijog. Apni janen, ami mone kori ami pochondo kori ami shudhu cheyechhilam, je amon akta ongshoer onshotike bolun je eti bokami kora hochhe, apni janen, apni ke apni onyo sobar shuro shere onobinoy korchhen na. Eto jhao dao.
Apni abeg er dik theke jhapte parben?
Hyan.
Tai eti ongshorin shomolochok, tara shombidhanshil dik theke shomolochok shobdo tir protikriya janay.
Hyan.
Thik achhe. Tai abhyantoreen samalochakke shudhu ekati swarthapor bola hoy ebong jinisgulir madhye ekati hol protikriya.
Amar mone hochhe amake akramon kora hochhe. Ebong ami mone kori na je nijer sambhorko chinta kora bhul ebong ami ja sambhorko sotyi utshahi.

Amake apanake badha dite din. Tai apanar hat careerer dike emotional selfer dike ishara karchhe. Apani apanar hat diye ki karte paren ja sotyi murtto kore tole je apani abhyantoreen samalochaker sathe jogajog karte chan? Apani ki karte chan onno kichu ache?
Samalochokra ja bolchhe ta theke nijake raksha karar jonno amar dike ishara kara. Ami shudhu samalochokder dike je pichhane dhakka chai.
Sutarang chaliye jan ebong sekhane sei gati bhabhar korun. Apani, apani abhyantoreen samalochakke dure thele dichhen. Thik achhe.
Tai amake doshi bodh karar dorkar nei apani janen, amar swapno anusaran korte chawar jonno amar swarthapor bodh karar dorkar nei
Abhyantoreen samalochaker ki fire balar kichhu ache?
Na.
Tai apani ekhon abeger diktikey samalochanamulokbhave thele dicihen.

Thik achhe. Ami mone kori samalochok, samalochok mone koren je eti bujhte pare je amar abeger dikti kotha theke asche. Apani janen, jemon ami chinte pari keno eti eto guruttopurno, tahole, keno eto kothor porishrom kora mulyoban, apani janen, krititver anubhuti ja etir sathe ashte chhile, dirghomeyade eti kibhabe sahayata korbe ei samasto atirikkho jinis ja ami bhobishote amar paribarke pochondo korte chai. Ami je dekhte pachhi.
Thik achhe, tai abhyantoreen samalochak hol je ekhane hat niche abhyantoreen samalochok. Thik? Eti ekati abhyantoreen samalochak kom ragani, kom dridhpronoy,
Kom dhakka, kom dhakka, kom dhakka. Hyan, ta noy. Samalochanamulok noy. Sotyi bolte ki, ami mone kori je chhopta du'to kandhei doainke birkto korchhe
Tai samalochak ekhon aro bichhinno hoyto kichhuta holeo bhinn drishtibhongiyo roechhe.
Aro shanto. Eta sobsomoy amar upor chitkar moto na. Karan ami mone kori ami bote chachhi, kothono kothono eti eti kichhu bote pare tobe etir ager moto joruri noy.
Tai samalochak tar kichhu shakti ebong sankalpa hariyeche.
Hyan,
Abeger jete?

Ami shanto bodh korchi. Ami mone kori apni janen, samalochak shobda amar ekti onsho. Kintu amar je onsho eti aro bhalo legeche, apni janen, eto hisabe dridh noy. Eta apni janen na, tibro ei muhurte eti ekati kol. Ebong ami mone kori je amar shombondonshil onshoti yuktithe joylobe korte shokkhom hoyeche, apni janen, shudhu ei karone, apni janen, ami ki chai.

Sutarang ei dundover seshe, amra ekhane duti bhage bibhokto hoar pore, tader ei dundovti ses porjonto ekati siddhanto hol ekati kormojibon ba thitu hoar siddhanto. Apani ki mone koren je apni ei siddhante aro spostota arjon korchen?
Hyan. Karan ami mone kori ami, apni janen, ami amar siddhante thakte pari, apni janen, amar careerer pothe thakte hoyeche, kintu ekhon ami eti kore doshi bodh kori.
Tai, eta sotyi sob somoy apnar siddhanto hoyeche. Kintu abhyantoreen samalochok apnake ei puro somoy hoyrani korchechilen?
Hyan.

Ebong aj apni sei abhyantoreen samalochakke kichhuta pichhane thele dite shokkho. Ebong sei abhyantoreen samalochakke dekhar anumoti din je apni je siddhanto niechen tate apni koto dridho anubhab korchen.
Hyan, je ami khub.
Apani ki sahayak kaushal mone koren?
Hyan, ami kori. Ami, apni janen, ami mone kori je duiti pokshe alada kora amake bujhte sahayyo kore je kono ti shaktishali mone hochhe.
Sutarang tini apnake kichhu spostota dite shokkho hoecchen.
Hyan.

Thik. Thik achhe. Wael, asun ekbar pratifalito kora jak ekhane ki ghotechhe, ekhon ebong poroborti seshoner modhye, thik achhe, bai, bondhura. Onek kichu ghotechhe. Ebong mone hochhe apni apnar siddhante jonno spostota arjon korchen. Ebong tarpor amra poroborti seshoner sathe bachai korbo ebong dekhabo kibhabe jinisguli ageyechhe. Dekhun je abhyantoreen samalochak ekhon o apnake hoyrani korche ba eti kichhuta pichhe ache kina. Ebong jodi apnar siddhante sath e thake tobe eti ekati porikolpanar moto noy.
